name: Evacuation (itch) (Kiel97)
description:
A fire has been set in a building. As you arrived building's fate is sealed but you can still rescue many lives. You equipped with life net and brave firefighter will try to save as many people jumping from windows as possible. Make it quick! Fire consumes tower in seconds!

Controls:
Move Mouse to move Life Net

Scoring:

- Catch falling person with life net - 1 point

- Catch person from window - 2 points

- Catch falling person with jumping firefighter - 3 points

Inspired by Flying Hero game from NES.

Images, fonts and sound effects used from Kenney.nl

Made for TriJam 155 (Gameplay under 1 minute!) in 5 hours
